price: Mu by’ukuri, iyo baza kwemera bakanagandukira Imana, ibihembo bituruka kwa Allah byari kuba byiza kuri bo, iyo baza kubimenya.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَمَثُوبَةٞ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞۚ لَّوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaw annahum āmanū wa-ittaqaw lamathūbatun min ʿindi al-lahi khayrun law kānū yaʿlamūna
